title: Citi Takes Top Honors at Prestigious Industry Awards
summary: London - Citi has won multiple industry accolades, including Funds Europe's 'European Custodian of the Year,' Custody Risk's 'Custodian of the Year' for Latin America and Hong Kong and Global Investor/ISF's 'Global Custodian of the Year' for its MENA investment awards.
tag-1: Citi Takes Top Honors at Prestigious Industry Awards
tag-2: London – Citi has won multiple industry accolades, including Funds Europe's 'European Custodian of the Year,' Custody Risk's 'Custodian of the Year' for Latin America and Hong Kong and Global Investor/ISF's 'Global Custodian of the Year' for its MENA investment awards.
tag-3: The awards are designed to identify excellence in the industry, demonstrated clearly in areas such as performance, growth, innovation, development, client service and commitment to the industry.
tag-4: Citi was also highly commended for Custody Risk's 'UCITS Fund Administrator of the Year' and also won its 'Transition Management Provider of the Year' award.
tag-5: Citi Middle East was once again recognized at the Global Investor/ISF's 2016 MENA Capital Markets Awards Summit, where Citibank NA UAE Investor Services picked up the award for 'Best Global Custodian' for its Middle East Global Custody solution and services. Global Investor/ISF's MENA awards place a particularly high degree of focus on the needs of MENA investor clients.
tag-6: Okan Pekin, Global Head of Investor Services at Citi, said, "We are delighted to have achieved these results and to be recognized for our market-leading services. We thank our customers who are constantly encouraging us to expand our capabilities and footprint to address a wide variety of customer needs."
tag-7: Sanjiv Sawhney, Global Head of Custody and Fund Services at Citi, said: "We are thrilled to receive these multiple awards, which honor outstanding innovation and product launches in the industry. We continuously seek to gain a deep understanding of our clients and how they operate. Our aim is to create effective solutions that meet their exact needs."
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
